code:
flowchart TD
    A[Low Glucose] --> B[Snf1 Activation]
    B --> C[Snf1 Phosphorylation]
    C --> D[Catabolite Repression Relief]
    D --> E[Gluconeogenic Gene Expression]
    E --> F[PEPCK Production]
    F --> G[FBPase Production]
    G --> H[G6Pase Production]
    
    %% Gluconeogenic pathway
    I[Pyruvate] --> J[Pyruvate Carboxylase]
    J --> K[Oxaloacetate]
    K --> L[PEPCK]
    L --> M[Phosphoenolpyruvate]
    M --> N[Gluconeogenic Enzymes]
    N --> O[Fructose-1,6-BP]
    O --> P[FBPase]
    P --> Q[Fructose-6-P]
    Q --> R[Glucose-6-P]
    R --> S[G6Pase]
    S --> T[Glucose]
    
    %% Alternative substrates
    U[Lactate] --> V[Lactate Dehydrogenase]
    V --> I
    
    W[Glycerol] --> X[Glycerol Kinase]
    X --> Y[Glycerol-3-P]
    Y --> Z[DHAP]
    Z --> N
    
    %% Regulation
    AA[High Glucose] --> BB[Snf1 Inhibition]
    BB --> CC[Gluconeogenesis Repression]
    
    DD[Low Energy] --> EE[AMPK Activation]
    EE --> FF[Gluconeogenesis Induction]
    
    %% Key proteins
    GG[Snf1] --> B
    HH[PEPCK] --> L
    II[FBPase] --> P
    JJ[G6Pase] --> S
    
    %% Styling
    classDef trigger fill:#ffcccc
    classDef enzyme fill:#ccffcc
    classDef metabolite fill:#ccccff
    classDef protein fill:#ffffcc
    
    class A,U,W trigger
    class F,G,H,J,L,P,S enzyme
    class I,K,M,O,Q,R,T metabolite
    class GG,HH,II,JJ protein
repo_description: Genome Logic Modeling Project - A systems biology initiative to model genomes as executable programs using AI
